data.eml:eml: SPC PROCFish/C Invertebrates Observations French Polynesia 2003, 2004 and 2006

Marine invertebrate species of commercial interest observed in French Polynesia during the PROCFish/C surveys (2003, 2004 and 2006) in 5 sites: Fakarava, Maatea, Mataiea, Raivavae and Tikehau with a mix of survey methods (manta tow, reef benthos transects, and day and night searches)
